abstract.t: The DIAMETER base protocol [2] allows for secure communicationbetween two DIAMETER nodes, and introduces the concept of proxyingthrough the Proxy-State AVP. However, the base protocol only allowsfor hop-by-hop security, and the work done in the ROAMOPS WG [8]shows that support for end-to-end security through proxies. Thisdocument describes the extensions necessary to provide for securecommunication through DIAMETER proxies.
